items.title: Mermaid in the Depths
items.article:
The Concept

This collection explores the ethereal beauty of mermaids submerged in deep azure waters. The focus was on capturing the interaction between light and water, creating a dreamlike atmosphere.

Technique & Variation

Using digital painting techniques, I layered multiple translucent washes to simulate the density of water. The series presents two variations: one focusing on the interaction with surface light, and another emphasizing the serenity and calmness of the underwater world with a softer palette.

Inspiration

Inspired by classical mythology and modern fantasy art, these illustrations aim to portray the mermaid not just as a creature of beauty, but as a powerful entity at one with her environment.

items.title: Guardian of the Abyss
items.article:
Character Design

This series represents warriors of the deep sea, clad in armor forged from coral and ancient metals. The design blends organic shapes with rigid protective structures, suggesting a civilization adapted to high-pressure environments.

Storytelling & Visuals

The collection showcases both defensive stances and dynamic motion. One piece focuses on a commanding, vigilant presence, while the other captures the warrior in action. Bioluminescent lighting effects were added to the armor to suggest both a natural light source and magical properties.
